amendment.description: To establish a goal of the Department of Defense relating to the use of renewable energy to meet electricity needs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4357 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4357 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Menendez. (consideration: CR S6117-6122; text: CR S6122) To establish a goal of the Department of Defense relating to the use of renewable energy to meet electricity needs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4357 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4357 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Menendez.
